name: Get Out! Remastered
description:
This is where it all starts! You wake up in a strange room with no recollection on how you got there. The door is locked, the TV doesn't work and... something is leaking from the ceiling? You have the urge to... GET OUT!

Explore the room and find all its secrets, pick up numerous objects, use them around, combine them and do anything you need to do so you can escape!

Get Out!: One Simple Room - Remastered Edition features new cartoon-style graphics, and it's a great starting point for the follow-up, Get Out! 2: Poker Night?!? already available for iOS devices!
https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/get-out-2/id1217224898
